text: Need Hayden Bell for Big W campaign. Budget arnd $23,970, looking for 2 x Facebook story, 3 x Lifestyle photography, 1 x 5-minute review, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
